subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The two-time N.B.A. most valuable player Karl Malone, the six-time champion Scottie Pippen and two of the United States Olympic champion teams are among the 19 finalists for the Naismith Memorial Hall of Fame.
snippet: The two-time N.B.A. most valuable player Karl Malone, the six-time champion Scottie Pippen and two of the United States Olympic champion teams are among the 19 finalists for the Naismith Memorial Hall of Fame.
